sources.title: Prairie Fever | FULL MOVIE | 2007 | Action, Western | Kevin Sorbo, Lance Henriksen, Dominique Swain
sources.description:
A down-and-out sheriff is given a shot at salvation when he’s paid to transport three women with “prairie fever” back to civilization. Crossing the perilous plains and outrunning a killer gang intent on stopping their passage, the sheriff finds his will to live again in the love of a woman on the run.

Kevin Sorbo, Jamie Anne Allman, Lance Henriksen, Jillian Armenante, Dominique Swain, Felicia Day, Lucy Lee Flippin

2007
Directed by Stephen Bridgewater, David S. Cass Sr.

Trivia:  This was TV character actress Lucy Lee Flippin's final role before retirement.  Flippin was most known for her recurring role as Eliza Jane Wilder on Little House on the Prairie, as well as for her role as Polly Holliday's sister in the Alice spin-off series Flo.

metadata.Plot: Drunken ex-sheriff Preston Biggs gets a ticket out of the jail-house and a fistful of cash to escort three half-crazed rejected mail-order brides to the nearest train back east. Along the way he teams up with a spunky, crooked lady gambler who wants to go straight and is running from her villainous husband Lance Henrickson.
metadata.Director: Stephen Bridgewater, David S. Cass Sr.
metadata.Actors: Kevin Sorbo, Lance Henriksen, Dominique Swain, Jamie Anne Allman
